publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-462 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: The Pesticides (Maximum Residue Levels in Crops, Food and Feedingstuffs) (Scotland) Regulations 2000-That the Parliament agrees that the draft Pesticides (Maximum Residue Levels in Crops, Food and Feedingstuffs) (Scotland) Regulations 2000 be approved.
